# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product offers unparalleled benefits and solutions, tailored to meet the most demanding needs of its users. Given its exceptional quality and innovative features, we believe it's worth more than $1000000 to us. Considering the immense value it brings to those who utilize it, we are extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $950000. This is a unique opportunity to secure this game-changing product at a significant discount. We look forward to discussing how this product could transform your business or personal endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
